title: Get more space on your Mac with these killer Amazon Prime Day storage deals
content:
Macworld

The second Amazon Prime Day for 2024 is this week. The Prime Big Deal Days sale runs on Tuesday and Wednesday (October 8-9). We’ll be keeping an eye on the best deals on hard drives and SSDs, so stay tuned for the best Amazon Prime Day Mac storage deals!

Looking for a great deal on a new hard drive or SSD to use with your Mac? We are seeing some great deals on storage in the Amazon Prime Day sale (running until midnight October 8-9), so there’s no better time to pick up a deal on some new external storage for your Mac.

During Amazon Prime Day Prime subscribers can take advantage of savings. To take advantage of the deals you will need Amazon Prime (which costs $14.99/ £8.99/AUD$6.99 a month but can be canceled after 30 days). If you don’t already have a Prime membership, you can sign up for the free 30-day trial and still take advantage of the deals.

The drives picked here are all chosen by our editors, who have decades of experience with Apple devices. We’ve reviewed most of the drives we recommend and for the ones we didn’t, we referenced one of our companion sites such as PCWorld, as well as our prior knowledge of the company. In short, we won’t tell you to buy something that’s not an actual deal. The products below are all at or near all-time lows, and we’ve selected what we think is the best configuration for each product type. We know Apple is expensive, so we’ve chosen products at prices we would be willing to pay, so you can trust that our recommendations will steer you in the right direction—and save you big bucks.

See our round-up of the Best Prime Day Apple Deals for our pick of the best Prime Day deals.

Amazon Prime Day: How can I get the best deals on Mac storage and SSDs?

Once Prime Day begins, most deals will be exclusive for Prime members, so you’ll need to sign in with an active membership to purchase one of the deals. Prime memberships cost $139 / £95 annually, or $14.99 / £8.99 / AU$6.99 every month. New users can sign up for a 30-day free trial that can be canceled at any time during the trial window. As well as access to sales prices, Prime members also get free two-day shipping and access to Prime Video and all the content available on that service.
